title: What Brad Leone of Bon Appetit Can’t Live Without
text:
Bose Noise-Canceling Wireless Bluetooth Headphones

Listen, I’m never going to be the kind of guy who wears Bose headphones on the street. I can’t fucking stand that — I don’t want to be in my own little bubble and drown out the whole world. Except when it comes to flying, I do want to drown out the whole world, and these do a very good job of that. They quiet the engine humming, the people talking. They’re so good that if I got to the airport and realized I forgot them, I’d probably buy another pair. They make the flight that much better.
description: Brad Leone of Bon Appetit on His Favorite Things 2019, including Bose Noise-Canceling Wireless Bluetooth Headphones, BioLite HeadLamp 330 Lumen No-Bounce Rechargeable Headlight, Patagonia Baggies Long Shorts and Civilware Striker Folding Knife.
